content: rs k1 p1 k1 to end row 2 ws p1 k1 p1 to end blackbird wings row 3 to 64 repeat row 1 to 2 thirty-one more make 2 per bird cast on 4 sts using 3 25mm times single pointed needles and black yarn start at the cast off in rib patt top body edge row 1 rs k1 kfb kfb sl1 wyif 6 sts making up sew side edges decrease stuffing as you row 2 ws k5 sl1 wyif sew poke a skewer inside the branch so that the row 3 k1 kfb k2 kfb sl1 wyif 8 sts pointy end protrudes by 4cm at one end and trim the blunt end so that it does not protrude at the row 4 to 8 k7 sl1 wyif other end poke the pointed end of the skewer row 9 knit to last 3 sts k2tog sl1 wyif 7 sts into the wreath so that the branch will sit row 10 to 13 repeat row 9 four more times 3 sts horizontally across the centre of the wreath then sew the cast on/off ends of the branch onto the row 14 k2tog sl1 wyif 2 sts wreath pull through to cast off bunny & rabbit hole making up use the beak cast on/off tails to sew the beak onto the body at the marked stitch and remove the marker then sew the side edges of bunny body the body decrease stuffing as you sew and gather the make 1 per bunny cast cast on sts decrease at the bottom sew on buttons eyes on 25 sts using 3 25mm single pointed on either side of the beak with a 5 stitch gap on needles and pale grey yarn start at the bottom either side between the eye and the beak and edge embroider a highlight besides each eye in a row 1 to 10 starting on a rs knit row work 10 slanting stitch in white embroidery row in st st thread or mending wool for each wing weave in cast off tails row 11 k1 k2tog k2 6 times 19 sts and sew the cast on edge onto row 12 purl the side of the body sew the side edge of the tail onto the row 13 k1 k2tog 9 times 10 sts bottom back of the body pull through to cast off autumn warmth wreath copyright © 2024 amanda berry page 6 of 19 bunny feet conkers & shells make 2 per bunny cast on 9 sts using 3 25mm single pointed needles and pale grey yarn start at the heel row 1 to 6 starting on a rs knit row work 6 row in st st row 7 k2 kfb k3 kfb k2 11 sts conker nut row 8 to 11 starting on a ws purl row work 4 make 1 per conker cast on 10 sts using 3 25mm row in st st single pointed needles and chocolate brown yarn start at the bottom row 12
